data.title: Laura (Smith) Wade (1925-2002)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Laura (Smith) Wade born 1925 Enfield Hali, North Carolina died 2002 Greenville, Pitt, North Carolina including parents + descendants + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Sister of [private brother (1920s - unknown)] and [private sister (1920s - unknown)]

Descendants

Mother of [private daughter (1940s - unknown)]

Profile last modified 16 May 2022 | Created 12 Oct 2021

This page has been accessed 61 times.

Biography

Laura was born on 1 April 1925 in Enfield Hali, North Carolina.[1]

In the 1930 census Laura (age 5) was living in Enfield, Enfield, Halifax, North Carolina, USA.[2]

When Laura was 17 she married Dorsey Wade on 22 September 1942 in Halifax, North Carolina, USA. The couple had one child: Gladys Cleo Wade.[3][4]

On 1 June 2002 Laura (age 77) was living in Wilson, Wilson, North Carolina.[5]

Laura died at the age of 77 on 1 June 2002 in Greenville, Pitt, North Carolina.[1][5]
